A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Truly a disappointment. Sad to see Star Wars ruined like this. Disney has replaced great characters with pointless ones. Rey is already the best at everything so what are the stakes? No risks were taken. All shocking moments are undone moments later without consequence. Just poorly done overall. Instead of bringing all fans of the franchise together\, Johnson decided to abandon the true fans for the sake of today’s political talking points. Nothing is wrong with diversity. But diversity does not guarantee quality. This movie is proud to add diverse characters but then makes them pointless to the plot. I’m told that fans who didn’t like this are the problem. Fans wanted to like this movie more than anything. It just sucks.
